name: Collision Mesh
description: Add or remove a collision mesh from the planning scene.

inputParameters.name: identifier
inputParameters.description: The identifier of the collision mesh.

inputParameters.name: add
inputParameters.description: If True, adds the collision mesh to the planning scene.

inputParameters.name: remove
inputParameters.description: If True, removes the collision mesh from the planning scene.

outputParameters.name: ok
outputParameters.description: True if the operation was successfully performed.
